title: Connection Quiz 10

questions.text: What's most important to me when we're having a conversation?
choices: That you remember what I say

questions.text: How do I prefer to give you feedback or criticism?
choices: By asking questions instead of stating

questions.text: What's my preferred listening style when you share problems?
How do I prefer you to communicate your needs to me?
choices: Written down so I can process
At a specific time when we can talk

questions.text: What communication habit of yours means the most to me?
choices: Checking in on me during the day

description: Learn about your journey of growing closer.
